description: This MCP server provides AI assistants with real-time access to RuneScape 3 game data through the RuneScape Wiki APIs. It enables AI systems to retrieve current Grand Exchange prices, detailed item information (including stats, examine text, and alchemy values), historical price trends with configurable time intervals, and player statistics from the official hiscores across different game modes (normal, ironman, hardcore ironman). The server acts as a bridge between AI applications and RuneScape's extensive database, allowing for dynamic queries about items, market analysis, player progression tracking, and game-related assistance without requiring direct API knowledge or authentication from the end user.

tools.name: get_item_price
tools.description: Get the current Grand Exchange price and details for a specific item

itemId.description: Item ID to get price and details for

tools.name: get_ge_info
tools.description: Get Grand Exchange Database information including last update date

tools.name: get_category_info
tools.description: Get information about a specific item category

tools.name: get_all_categories

tools.name: search_items
tools.description: Search for items by name, category, starting letter, price, or membership. Supports full-text search and advanced filters. Category numbers are listed in the README under "Item Category Mapping". Use get_all_categories for more details.

query.description: Full or partial item name to search for

sort_by.description: Sort results by name, price, or trend
